##

::: {style="font-size: 2em; color: #FFFFFF;"}
Getting Creative...
:::

```{r fish-plot}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: slide

library(forcats)
library(ggtext)

fish %>% 
  filter(is.na(weight)) %>% 
  group_by(year, section, trip) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  mutate(trip = as.factor(trip), 
         year = as.factor(year)) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(y = year, x = n, fill = trip)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  facet_wrap(~section) + 
  labs(y = "", 
       x = "") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Paired") +
  labs(title = str_c("Missing Fish Weights for ",
      "<span style = 'color:#A6CEE3'>**Trip 1**</span>",
      " and <span style = 'color:#1F87B4'>**Trip 2**</span>"),
      subtitle = "by Section of Blackfoot River"
    ) + 
  theme(plot.title = element_markdown(size = 24),
        plot.subtitle = element_markdown(size = 18),
        legend.position = "none", 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12), 
        axis.title = element_text(size = 16)
        )

```
